landingPage.description1: At All American Handyman, we specialize in providing top-notch handyman services. Our mission is to deliver reliable solutions and exceptional craftsmanship that exceed your expectations.
landingPage.description2: With a team of skilled professionals and a commitment to excellence, we offer a wide range of services to meet your home repair and improvement needs. From small repairs to major renovations, we prioritize quality, efficiency, and customer satisfaction.
landingPage.description3: Trust All American Handyman to be your reliable partner in maintaining and enhancing your home. Experience the difference with us as we deliver reliable solutions and build lasting trust in every project we undertake.
landingPage.cardDescription: Drywall, Painting, Pressure Washing, Plumbing, and more.
landingPage.electricityDescription: Add illumination to your space and empower your home with our premium electrical solutions.
landingPage.heatingACDescription: Enjoy optimal temperature control and year-round comfort with our powerful and reliable heating and cooling services that keep you warm in winter and refreshed in summer.
landingPage.paintingDescription: Transform your living space with a touch of color and professional painting craftsmanship.
landingPage.plumbingDescription: Ensure your plumbing system is functioning perfectly and avoid any potential issues with our reliable plumbing services.
landingPage.renovationDescription: Give your home a complete makeover with our premium renovation services and unique interior design.
landingPage.pressureWashingDescription: Get a clean and refreshed home with our powerful pressure washing services to remove stubborn dirt and grime.
landingPage.sanitaryDescription: Maintain the health and cleanliness of your home with our reliable and efficient sanitary services.
landingPage.drywallDescription: Repair damages in walls and ceilings and add beauty and extra protection to your space.
landingPage.aboutF: Frank Corsaro is an exceptional individual known for his unwavering dedication to helping others and ensuring the utmost care for his customers. With a strong sense of responsibility and a genuine passion for service, he consistently goes above and beyond to meet the needs of those around him. Not only is Frank Corsaro committed to his professional endeavors, but he is also a dedicated family man who deeply values his loved ones. His profound love and devotion to his family are evident in the way he cherishes every moment spent with them. He understands the importance of strong familial bonds and actively nurtures these relationships with love, respect, and support. In addition to his commitment to his family, Frank Corsaro holds a deep love for his country. He recognizes the value of patriotism and the significance of contributing to the betterment of his nation. Whether through his business practices or involvement in community initiatives, he consistently demonstrates a genuine desire to make a positive impact on his country and its citizens. Frank Corsaro's exceptional dedication to helping others, his unwavering commitment to his customers, and his profound love for his family and country truly make him a remarkable individual. His actions and values serve as an inspiration to others, reflecting the importance of kindness, compassion, and an unwavering sense of responsibility in both personal and professional life.

about.title: About Us
about.description1: At All American Handyman, we are a bonded and licensed company dedicated to delivering exceptional handyman services that go above and beyond for every customer we serve.
about.description2: Our skilled professionals specialize in a wide range of services, including electricity, heating, painting, plumbing, renovation, roofing, sanitary, and sewerage. We pride ourselves on our attention to detail, reliability, and professionalism.
about.description3: With a commitment to customer satisfaction, we go the extra mile to ensure that each project is completed to the highest standards. We listen to our customers' needs and provide tailored solutions using top-quality materials and industry best practices.
about.description4: While we may be a new company, our team has extensive experience in the handyman industry. We bring a wealth of knowledge and expertise to every project, allowing us to deliver outstanding results and exceed expectations.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.service: Service Area: Wheeling, WV · Weirton, WV · Toronto, OH · Brilliant, OH · Wintersville, OH · Mingo Junction, OH

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.description1: At All American Handyman, we are dedicated to making a positive impact on the environment and addressing the climate crisis. Our mission is to contribute to a sustainable future by ensuring the optimal performance and longevity of wind turbines.
cookiePolicy.description2: All American Handyman (here in after the COMPANY) wishes to provide you with all the necessary information on the cookies used on our so that you can make an informed decision on the use thereof and your privacy protection. The current cookies policy complements our Privacy Policy.
cookiePolicy.whatAreCookiesDescription: A cookie is a text file which is downloaded onto your device (computer, smart phone or tablet) when you access a website or use an application and allows the website holder to store or recover information regarding your browsing preferences.
cookiePolicy.complementaryPolicy: All American Handyman (hereinafter the COMPANY) wishes to provide you with all the necessary information on the cookies used on our so that you can make an informed decision on the use thereof and your privacy protection. The current cookies policy complements our Privacy Policy.
cookiePolicy.cookieTypes: What kind of cookies does this Website use?
cookiePolicy.cookieTypesDescription: We use cookies to enable, customise and analyse browsing preferences, thus improving the quality of the services offered. The cookies used are classified into different categories, though some may be included in more than one category:
cookiePolicy.sessionCookies: Session cookies: These are temporary cookies which are not stored on your device and disappear once you close your browsing session.
cookiePolicy.persistentCookies: Persistent cookies: These allow information to be stored on your hard drive and be used after you close your browser.
cookiePolicy.ownCookies: Own cookies: These are cookies sent to your hard drive from our own Website, although some are also provided by the Google Analytics tool.
cookiePolicy.thirdPartyCookies: Third party cookies: These are cookies which are sent to your device from a domain not managed by the COMPANY, but by a third company which will treat the information obtained through such cookies.
cookiePolicy.enableFunctionalities: To enable certain functionalities, our website uses cookies from: i) YouTube, Inc. for the playing of videos (https://www.google.com/intl/es_es/policies/technologies/cookies/); ii) SlideShare Inc. for downloading documents (http://www.linkedin.com/legal/cookie-policy), and iii) technical cookies from Euroland.com AB to provide access to stock exchange information.
cookiePolicy.technicalCookies: Technical cookies: These cookies make it possible for you to browse our Website and make use of the various options and services available, such as those allowing the tracking of traffic on the site and the provision of data, session identification, access to restricted areas or the use of security elements while browsing.
cookiePolicy.personalisationCookies: Personalisation cookies: These are cookies which allow you to access our Website with certain predefined specifications depending on criteria such as language, type of browser, or the regional configuration from which you access the service.
cookiePolicy.analyticsCookies: Analytics cookies: These are cookies used for tracking and analysing user behaviour. This type of cookie allows us to monitor activity on our Website through aggregate or statistical data on browsing habits. We uses analytical cookies, some of which are provided by Google Analytics (https://www.google.com/intl/en-GB/policies/technologies/cookies/) and the Hotjar Ltd. tool for generating heatmaps (a graphic representation of online user behaviour on a particular website) (https://www.hotjar.com/legal/policies/cookie-information).
cookiePolicy.cookieResponsibility: Who’s in charge of the cookies?
cookiePolicy.cookieResponsibilityDescription: The information collected through cookies downloaded from the domain managed by the COMPANY is used by the COMPANY, as well as by Google Inc. and Hotjar Ltd. as analytics services providers. Other third parties such as YouTube, Inc., SlideShare and Euroland.com AB can access the information collected by cookies managed from their own domains. For further information, please read the information contained in the abovementioned links, specially regarding the international transfers that might be performed by those suppliers.
cookiePolicy.manageCookiesDescription: On your visit to our Website, you will receive information on the use of cookies and this Cookie Policy, and you’ll be asked to consent the installation of cookies depending oin their type. On future visits to our Website, the user may consult this policy via the link provided. If at any time you wish to withdraw your consent in relation to cookies from our Website, or you wish to change your settings regarding this matter, you can our configuration panel in the lower right corner of the Website. Additionally, you may also erase all those cookies stored on your device. However, you should be aware of the fact that blocking the installation of, or eliminating, cookies could affect some of the functionalities, services or content of our Website.
cookiePolicy.dataRetention: For how long is my information kept?
cookiePolicy.dataRetentionDescription: In case of by using cookies any personal data is processed, such data will be kept as long as it’s needed for the purpose it was collected. Once achieved such a purpose, your data will be kept blocked in case any public administration requires it during those legal terms applicable in each case for any kind of reason regarding the processing activity. After that, your data will be erased.
cookiePolicy.policyModification: Modification and updating of this policy
cookiePolicy.policyModificationDescription: The COMPANY may totally or partially modify the current Cookies Policy, publishing its new versions in the same way as the current one is published or by way of any other kind of communication aimed to the website’s users, depending on what the legal or regulatory obligations are, as well as depending on what the purpose of updating the Policy is. Considering so, we suggest you checking from time to time the current Policy.
cookiePolicy.modificationTitle: Modification and updating of this policy
cookiePolicy.modificationDescription: The COMPANY may totally or partially modify the current Cookies Policy, publishing its new versions in the same way as the current one is published or by way of any other kind of communication aimed to the website’s users, depending on what the legal or regulatory obligations are, as well as depending on what the purpose of updating the Policy is. Considering so, we suggest you checking from time to time the current Policy.

servicesPage.electricityDescription1: Electricity is the set of physical phenomena associated with the presence and motion of matter that has a property of electric charge. In early days, electricity was considered as being not related to magnetism. Later on, many experimental results and the development of Maxwell’s equations indicated that both electricity and magnetism are from a single phenomenon: electromagnetism. Various common phenomena are related to electricity, including lightning, static electricity, electric heating, electric discharges, and many others.
servicesPage.electricityDescription2: The presence of an electric charge, which can be either positive or negative, produces an electric field. The movement of electric charges is an electric current and produces a magnetic field.
servicesPage.centralHeatingACDescription1: Central heating and air conditioning systems provide both heating and cooling functions for residential and commercial buildings. The heat generation for central heating occurs in one place, such as a furnace room or mechanical room, and the heat is distributed throughout the building using forced-air through ductwork or water/steam through pipes. In central air conditioning, the cooling process is achieved by circulating refrigerant through a compressor and evaporator coil to remove heat from indoor air.
servicesPage.centralHeatingACDescription2: In many temperate climate zones, central heating and air conditioning systems are commonly installed to maintain comfortable indoor temperatures throughout the year. These systems have evolved from coal-fired steam or hot water systems to more efficient fuel oil or gas combustion, reducing the need for coal storage and ash removal. Both heating and cooling components require regular maintenance and occasional repairs to ensure optimal performance.
servicesPage.paintingDescription1: Painting is the practice of applying paint, pigment, color, or other medium to a solid surface (support base). The medium is commonly applied to the base with a brush, but other implements, such as knives, sponges, and airbrushes, can be used. The final work is also called a painting.
servicesPage.paintingDescription2: Painting is an important form in the visual arts, bringing in elements such as drawing, gesture (as in gestural painting), composition, narration (as in narrative art), or abstraction (as in abstract art). Paintings can be naturalistic and representational (as in a still life or landscape painting), photographic, abstract, narrative, symbolistic (as in Symbolist art), emotive (as in Expressionism), or political in nature (as in Artivism).
servicesPage.plumbingDescription1: Plumbing is any system that conveys fluids for a wide range of applications. It uses pipes, valves, plumbing fixtures, tanks, and other apparatuses to convey fluids. Heating and cooling (HVAC), waste removal, and potable water delivery are among the most common uses for plumbing, but it is not limited to these applications. The word derives from the Latin for lead, plumbum, as the first effective pipes used in the Roman era were lead pipes.
servicesPage.plumbingDescription2: In the developed world, plumbing infrastructure is critical to public health and sanitation. While boilermakers and pipefitters work with piping as part of their trade, plumbing encompasses a broader scope of systems and applications.
servicesPage.renovationDescription1: Renovation (also known as remodeling) is the process of improving a broken, damaged, or outdated structure. Renovations can be undertaken for both commercial and residential properties. It involves making significant changes to the existing structure to enhance its functionality, aesthetics, and overall value. Renovation projects can range from small upgrades to extensive transformations, depending on the client's requirements and goals.
servicesPage.renovationDescription2: Our team of skilled professionals is experienced in various aspects of home renovation. We offer a wide range of services to meet your specific needs, including but not limited to:
servicesPage.pressureWashingDescription1: Pressure washing, also known as power washing, is the process of using high-pressure water spray to remove dirt, grime, mold, mildew, and other contaminants from various surfaces. It is an effective method for cleaning and rejuvenating different surfaces, including sidewalks, driveways, fences, exteriors, and more.
servicesPage.pressureWashingDescription2: Pressure washing utilizes advanced techniques and equipment to achieve thorough cleaning results. The high-pressure water spray helps to remove tough stains, dirt buildup, and even peeling paint, restoring the appearance and enhancing the overall aesthetics of surfaces.
servicesPage.pressureWashingDescription3: Whether you want to revitalize your outdoor spaces, prepare surfaces for painting or renovation, or simply maintain a clean and fresh look, pressure washing can provide excellent results.
servicesPage.sanitaryDescription1: Sanitary services involve the maintenance, repair, and installation of plumbing systems, specifically focusing on bathroom fixtures and related components. A properly functioning sanitary system is essential for the effective removal and disposal of wastewater, ensuring hygiene and sanitation in residential and commercial spaces.
servicesPage.sanitaryDescription2: Our skilled professionals are experienced in handling various bathroom repair and sanitary tasks, including faucet repair, toilet installation, drain cleaning, pipe leak detection, and more. We strive to provide efficient and reliable solutions to keep your bathroom and sanitary systems in optimal condition.
servicesPage.drywallDescription1: Drywall is a common type of wall used in construction and interior finishes. It consists of gypsum panels attached to a wooden or metal framework. It is used to create solid, level, and fire-resistant interior walls.
servicesPage.drywallDescription2: Our drywall services include the installation and repair of drywall walls in homes, offices, and commercial buildings. Our team of experienced professionals ensures proper installation of drywall panels and resolves any damages or cracks that may occur.
